en:
Found at Empries, from an unidentified tomb (said to be on a road near the
      beach. Formerly in Barcelona, Museo Arqueolgico 33, and earlier Palace de la Diputacio,
      Formerly in the Alfaras Collection [before 1908]).

<bibl>LIMC</bibl>, 7.142 s.v. Paidia no. 12, pl. 96 (A.
      Kossatz-Deissmann), 899 s.v. Thaleia 4 no. 6 (A. Kossatz-Deissmann); <bibl>Shapiro
      1993</bibl>, 129-30, 183-85, 246 no. 64, figs. 85, 143, 145;
      <bibl>LIMC</bibl>, 6.92 s.v. Komodia no. 4 (A. Kossatz-Deissmann);
      <bibl>Kossatz-Deissmann 1991</bibl>, 94 fig. 6,187-88, 190;
      <bibl>LIMC</bibl>, 4.153 s.v. Galene 2 no. 3 (A. Kossatz-Deissmann);
      <bibl>Arribas 1967, 182-85 no. 589 pls., 100-104</bibl>; <bibl>Froning
      1971</bibl>, 5 n. 30, 10-11, 15, 20, 66; <bibl>Hibbs 1961</bibl> 61-62, fig.
      67; A. Garca y Bellido, <hi rend="ital">Las colonizaciones pnica y griega en la
      peninsula ibrica</hi> (Madrid 1954) 582-83 figs 492-93; P. Bosch i Gimpera and J. de C.
      Serra i Rfols, <hi rend="ital">CVA Muse Archologique de Barcelone</hi> 1
      (1951-1957) 36-38 pls. 31.2, 32-34 (with previous bibliography); <bibl>Bellado 1948,
      2.15-67 no. 133, figs 43-44, pls. 107-109</bibl>; <hi rend="ital">Corolla
      Curtius</hi> (Stuttgart 1937) 157-59; A. Garca y Bellido, <hi rend="ital">Los
      hallazgos griegos des Espana</hi> (Madrid 1936) 121-23; J. Botet y Sis, <hi
      rend="ital">Data aproximada en que'ls grechs s'establiren Empires</hi> (Gerona 1908)
      33.
